name: Phar.compressAllFilesBZIP2
purpose: Compresses all files in the current Phar archive using Bzip2 compression

return.description: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

errors:
Throws BadMethodCallException if
   the phar.readonly
   INI variable is on, the bzip2
   extension is not available, or if any files are compressed using
   gzip compression and the zlib extension
   is not enabled.
